meanings.definition: Capable of being interchanged or swapped.
meanings.sent1: These two toys are interchangeable because you can easily swap their parts.
meanings.sent2: The blue and red pens are interchangeable, so you can use either one to write.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how the twins are almost interchangeable, always confusing people.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, the pawns are like interchangeable soldiers on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The keys on the keyboard are interchangeable, allowing you to type smoothly.

meanings.definition: Able to be used in place of each other.
meanings.sent1: My black shoes and brown shoes are interchangeable, so I can wear either pair with my outfit.
meanings.sent2: The two brands of batteries are interchangeable, so you can use either in the remote control.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing how the actors in the play are almost interchangeable, making the audience do a double-take.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, scarves are like interchangeable accessories that can transform an outfit.
meanings.sent5: The parts of the toy are interchangeable, allowing you to create different combinations.

meanings.sent1: The light bulbs in the lamp are interchangeable, so you can easily switch them out.
meanings.sent2: The phone covers are interchangeable, letting you replace them to match your mood.
meanings.sent3: It's comical how the characters in the movie are almost interchangeable, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: In a toolbox, the different screwdriver heads are like interchangeable tools for various tasks.
meanings.sent5: The parts of the machine are interchangeable, making maintenance simple.
